definition: cartilaginous fishes/Chondrichthyes (taxonomic class including sharks and rays)

sentences.english: The perichondrium carries the blood supply to the cartilage.
sentences.chinese: 软骨膜是向软骨输送血液的。

sentences.english: The perichondrium carries the blood supply to the cartilage.
sentences.chinese: 软骨膜是向软骨输送血液的。

sentences.english: Later, at home, Zilla would accuse him of being a coward and a weakling .
sentences.chinese: 等到了家里，齐拉就数落他是个懦夫，软骨头。

sentences.english: The fluorescence stain in chondrocyte was quenched with laser.
sentences.chinese: 激光淬灭软骨细胞内的荧光染料。

sentences.english: In contrast, growth plate cartilage is primary cartilage and is made up of hyaline cartilage.
sentences.chinese: 生长板软骨为原发性软骨，由透明软骨构成。

sentences.english: In contrast, growth plate cartilage is primary cartilage and is made up of hyaline cartilage.
sentences.chinese: 生长板软骨为原发性软骨，由透明软骨构成。

sentences.english: In contrast, growth plate cartilage is primary cartilage and is made up of hyaline cartilage.
sentences.chinese: 生长板软骨为原发性软骨，由透明软骨构成。

sentences.english: Bi-pedicle muscular flap were used to reconstruct the larynx.
sentences.chinese: 残喉创面修复用双蒂肌软骨膜瓣重建喉功能。

sentences.english: I'm afraid my sister married a real wimp.
sentences.chinese: 我看我的妹妹大概是嫁了一个真正的软骨头。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the mechanism of immuno- rejection for the swine allogenic chondrocytes in transplantation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨猪软骨细胞同种异体移植的免疫排斥机制。

sentences.english: Hyoid bone and arytenoid cartilages were resected and cricoid cartilage anastomosis with the base of the tongue and submental muscles.
sentences.chinese: 常规切除舌骨将环状软骨与舌根及颏下肌肉吻合。

sentences.english: In other research, chondroitin is being investigated for use in several other conditions.
sentences.chinese: 在其它研究，软骨素被调查用于几个其它情况。

sentences.english: Cracks will occur in the region of the thyroid cartilage because of deglutition.
sentences.chinese: 甲状软骨部分会由于吞咽动作而龟裂。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the value of spiral CT in diagnosing costal cartilage fractures.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨螺旋CT在肋软骨骨折诊断中的应用价值。

sentences.english: This article will summarize the relationship between the markers of cartilage collagens and osteoarthritis.
sentences.chinese: 本文对软骨胶原标志物与骨性关节炎的关系作一综述。

sentences.english: The exception is articular cartilage and the subchondral bone, which should be preserved if at all possible.
sentences.chinese: 除了关节软骨和软骨下骨，这些应该尽可能保留。

definition: articular capsule (of joint such as knee in anatomy)
